about_the_game:
An Open World Game where you travel a dirty crime ridden city as you move up the in depth social hierarchy. Start off the game with nothing but a rugged apartment and make your way to the top through black market business and crime. You are able to run advanced businesses and manage your criminal empire all around the city.

You can own Raw Resources which are stored in your Warehouses. These Resources can be transferred in and out of Factories that you can BUILD! After products are made, you can either ship them directly to the market or sell them yourself with stores that you can customize.

With an in depth vehicle modification and weapon system, there's plenty of equipment to complete high paying contracts.

Notable Features:
- Warehouses
- Businesses
- Factories
- Contract Work
- Day/Night Cycle
- Character Customization
- Organ/Bleed Health System
- Story
- Black Market
- Stock Market
detailed_description:
Alpha Testing

Thanks to all my patreon supporters for making development possible. As a reward I'm giving away a free access key to every patreon member!


About the Game

An Open World Game where you travel a dirty crime ridden city as you move up the in depth social hierarchy. Start off the game with nothing but a rugged apartment and make your way to the top through black market business and crime. You are able to run advanced businesses and manage your criminal empire all around the city.

You can own Raw Resources which are stored in your Warehouses. These Resources can be transferred in and out of Factories that you can BUILD! After products are made, you can either ship them directly to the market or sell them yourself with stores that you can customize.

With an in depth vehicle modification and weapon system, there's plenty of equipment to complete high paying contracts.

- Businesses
- Factories
- Contract Work

name: Tomorrow's Past

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 32 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: The game will continue to be improved to run on lower end hardware!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2080
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 32 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

short_description: Explore a city lost in time. Run extensive black market businesses! Construct factories and transportation networks to become the Mob Boss you've always wanted to be!
